JOB DESCRIPTION: Position: Junior Software Engineer    1.An computer science fresher is preferred to have curiosity and interest to work on diverse platforms.   2. Candidate should have preferably good logical and mathematical skills.   3. Candidate should be good in communication and presentation skills as he will have to interact with customers, solving their technical problems and work on documentation/presentations.   4. Candidate should be proficient in any programming language preferably C# or Java and interested to learn other programming languages on need basis.   5. Candidate will be part of R&D, client interactions, and technical documentation based on their skill and project needs.
